definitions.definition: To participate in bebop jazz, such as by dancing in a way associated with the genre.
To walk in an easygoing , carefree manner.
definitions.label_groups: intransitive , usually with a directional preposition

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To participate in bebop jazz, such as by dancing in a way associated with the genre.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , usually with a directional preposition ) To walk in an easygoing , carefree manner.
